explanation: based on the historical price data provided, meta has shown a consistent upward trend over the last year, moving from a low of 106.40 in november 2022 to 328.49 in november 2023. this represents a significant increase in value, suggesting strong positive momentum. in contrast, gme has been on a downward trend, with its price decreasing from 39.48 in december 2021 to 13.15 in november 2023. googl has shown some recovery from its lows but has been relatively flat in recent months. spy, which tracks the s&p 500, has shown some volatility but has been relatively stable in the past few months. given meta's strong performance and upward trajectory, it is likely to offer the best potential for profit if this trend continues through december 2023. therefore, investing 10000 dollars in meta seems to be the most promising option to maximize profits by the end of the month, assuming the trend persists.
